data.Sentence_cn: 1963年，一架兰开斯特轰炸机在瓦立斯岛坠毁。那是南太平洋中一个很偏僻的小岛，位于萨摩亚群岛以西，距离群岛还有很长一段距离。
data.Sentence: In 1963 a Lancaster bomber crashed on Wallis Island, a remote place in the South Pacific, a long way west of Samoa.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机损坏的程度并不严重，但是，多年来这起飞机失事已被遗忘，飞机残骸也没受到破坏。
data.Sentence: The plane wasn't too badly damaged, but over the years, the crash was forgotten and the wreck remained undisturbed.

data.Sentence_cn: 于是，到了1989年，飞机失事26年后，在对小岛的一次航空勘查中那架飞机被意外地发现了。
data.Sentence: Then in 1989, twenty-six years after the crash, the plane was accidentally rediscovered in an aerial survey of the island.

data.Sentence_cn: 到了那个时候，状况良好的兰开斯特轰炸机实属罕见，值得抢救。
data.Sentence: By this time, a Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition was rare and worth rescuing.

data.Sentence_cn: 法国政府让人把飞机包装起来，一部分一部分地搬回法国。
data.Sentence: The French authorities had the plane packaged and moved in parts back to France.

data.Sentence_cn: 一群热心人计划修复这架飞机。
data.Sentence: Now a group of enthusiasts are going to have the plane restored.

data.Sentence_cn: 该飞机装装配有4台罗尔斯-罗伊斯的默林发动机，但是他们只需要修复其中的3台。
data.Sentence: It has four Rolls-Royce Merlin engines, but the group will need to have only three of them rebuilt.

data.Sentence_cn: 想一想他们所感受到的惊奇和兴奋 -- 当他们拆开包装箱时，他们发现第4台发动机就像蜂蜜一样甜 -- 发动机完好无损。
data.Sentence: Imagine their surprise and delight when they broke open the packing cases and found that the fourth engine was sweet as honey -- still in perfect condition.

data.Sentence_cn: 一群蜜蜂把发动机当作了蜂房，发动机在蜂蜡中被完整地保存了下来。
data.Sentence: A colony of bees had turned the engine into a hive and it was totally preserved in beeswax!
